Description:
Responsibilities1. Attend/participate in Agile ceremonies

2. Work with the Engineers to ensure high quality testable requirements

3. Conduct testing for the project sprints, meeting deadlines.

4. Create automation tests ensuring high coverage and minimal technical debt (adhering to automation standards)

5. Where required conduct manual functional testing

Skills/Exp

1. UK insurance experience (desirable)

2. Minimum 3 years working in Agile (Ideally SAFE)

3. Strong communication skills

4. Experience working with BDD

5. Minimum 3 years C# hands on experience

6. API Testing

7. API Testing, Contract testing, RestSharp

8. Experience in Stub / Service VirtualizationJob Details
